title: Reddit Wants to Get Paid for Helping to Teach Big A.I. Systems
description: The internet site has long been a forum for discussion on a huge variety of topics, and companies like Google and OpenAI have been using it in their A.I. projects.

title: Apple Opens First Store in India, a Promising Frontier for the Tech Giant
description: Tim Cook, the chief executive of the iPhone maker, visited Mumbai to inaugurate the store. Apple is pushing to grow its market share in India, as well as shift some production there.

title: What Was Twitter, Anyway?
description: Whether the platform is dying or not, it’s time to reckon with how exactly it broke our brains.
